methods.name: <init>

params.name: block
params.comment: instruction block which corresponds to this error

params.name: instructionAddress
params.comment: address of new intended instruction which failed to be created

params.name: conflictAddress
params.comment: address of another code unit which conflicts with new intended instruction

methods.name: <init>

params.name: block
params.comment: instruction block which corresponds to this error

params.name: contextValue
params.comment: disassembler context used during instruction parse

params.name: instructionAddress
params.comment: address of new intended instruction which failed to be created

methods.javadoc: @return instruction block which corresponds to this error
methods.name: getInstructionBlock

return.comment: instruction block which corresponds to this error

methods.javadoc: @return address of new intended instruction which failed to be created (never null)
methods.name: getInstructionAddress

return.comment: address of new intended instruction which failed to be created (never null)

methods.name: getConflictAddress

return.comment:
address of another code unit which conflicts
 with intended instruction (required for CODE_UNIT 
 and DUPLCIATE errors, null for others)

methods.javadoc:
@return disassembler context at intended instruction
 address (required for PARSE error, null for others)
methods.name: getParseContextValue

return.comment:
disassembler context at intended instruction
 address (required for PARSE error, null for others)

methods.javadoc: @return flow-from address if know else null
methods.name: getFlowFromAddress

return.comment: flow-from address if know else null
